plot outline: Nayana is a seven-year old artist. While she displays sparks of talent as a sketcher, her parents discover that she cannot identify colours because of colour blindness. While in a hospital for the treatment, Nayana befriends a septuagenarian who shares similar vision issues. The film progresses on their treatment tracks and results.
title: Nayana
plot: _Nayana_ (qv) is a seven-year old artist. While she displays sparks of talent as a sketcher, her parents discover that she cannot identify colours because of colour blindness. While in a hospital for the treatment, _Nayana_ (qv) befriends a septuagenarian who shares similar vision issues. The film progresses on their treatment tracks and results.
